item.title: Google Vertex AI: Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK
item.description:
Provider: Google Vertex AI Model ID: Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK Model: Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK Shutdown Date: 2026-06-24
Starting on June 24, 2025, the Generative AI module in the Vertex AI SDK is deprecated. The Generative AI module will be removed on June 24, 2026. For information about migrating to the Google Gen AI SDK, seeVertex AI SDK migration guide.

item.title: Google Vertex AI: Imagen imagegeneration@002
item.description:
Provider: Google Vertex AI Model ID: imagegeneration@002 Model: Imagen imagegeneration@002 Shutdown Date: 2025-09-24
Starting on June 24, 2025, Imagen versions 1 and 2, image captioning, and visual question answering are deprecated.On September 24, 2025 , the following features and models will be removed:image captioningvisual question answeringImagen 1 modelsimagegeneration@002Imagen 2 modelsimagegeneration@005andimagegeneration@006For more information about migrating to Imagen 3, seeMigrate to Imagen 3.

item.description:
Provider: AWS Bedrock Model ID: ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0 Model: ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0 Shutdown Date: March 12, 2025 (only in us-east-1)
Model ai21.jamba-instruct-v1:0. entered legacy status on October 4, 2024 (only in us-east-1). and will reach end-of-life on March 12, 2025 (only in us-east-1).

Model stability.stable-image-core-v1:0, stability.stable-image-ultra-v1:0, and stability.sd3-large-v1:0. entered legacy status on October 16, 2024 (us-east-1 and us-west-2). and will reach end-of-life on May 20, 2025 (us-east-1 and us-west-2).

item.title: Cohere: Command-R-03-2024 Fine-tuned Models
item.description:
Provider: Cohere Model ID: Command-R-03-2024-finetuned Model: Command-R-03-2024 Fine-tuned Models Shutdown Date: 2025-03-08
2025-03-08: Command-R-03-2024 Fine-tuned Models On March 08, 2025, we will sunset all models fine-tuned with Command-R-03-2024. As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance our services, we are making the following changes to our fine-tuning capabilities: Deprecating fine-tuning with the older Command-R-03-2024 modelAll fine-tunes are now powered by the Command-R-08-2024 model. Models fine-tuned with Command-R-03-2024 will continue to be supported until March 08, 2025. After this date, all requests...

item.title: Cohere: Classify Default Embed Models
item.description:
Provider: Cohere Model ID: classify-default-embed Model: Classify Default Embed Models Shutdown Date: 2025-01-31
2025-01-31: Default Classify endpoint After January 31st, 2025, usage of Classify endpoint via the default Embed models will be deprecated. However, you can still use the Classify endpoint with a fine-tuned Embed model. By leveraging fine-tuning, you can achieve even better performance and accuracy in your classification tasks. Read the documentation onClassify fine-tuningfor more information.

item.title: Cohere: rerank-english-v2.0
item.description:
Provider: Cohere Model ID: rerank-english-v2.0 Model: rerank-english-v2.0 Shutdown Date: 2025-04-30
2024-12-02: Rerank v2.0 On December 2nd, 2024, we announced the release of Rerank-v3.5 along with the deprecation of the Rerank-v2.0 model family. Fine-tuned models created from these base models are not affected by this deprecation. Shutdown DateDeprecated ModelDeprecated Model PriceRecommended Replacement2025-04-30rerank-english-v2.0$1.00 / 1K searchesrerank-v3.52025-04-30rerank-multilingual-v2.0$1.00 / 1K searchesrerank-v3.5 Best Practices: Regularly check our documentation for updates on ann...
